181928/f Penny 2000/t 900 1600/w sunny/G: 50s/-1000 -1000/farmer 75 40 2 Penny 71 45 2 Jas 71 49 3 Vincent 70 49 1/skippable/specificTemporarySprite pennyFieldTrip/positionOffset Penny 0 -16/animate Jas false true 90 16 17 18 19/viewport 71 45 true/move farmer 0 5 3/pause 600/faceDirection Penny 1/pause 600/speak Penny "@！你來得正好。"/emote farmer 8/speak Penny "我要帶孩子們去郊外農場進行一次小小的郊遊。#$b#你對鄉下生活很了解吧？$h"/speak Penny "$q -1 null#所以我就想……今天你能當我們的客座解說員嗎？#$r -1 10 event_speaker_yes#我很樂意。#$r -1 0 event_speaker_yes#當然。#$r -1 -1500 event_speaker_no#不……我受不了小孩。"/fork eventEnd/faceDirection Penny 2/faceDirection farmer 2/showFrame Penny 26/pause 500/shake Penny 500/speak Penny "潔絲！文森！聽我說！"/pause 80/stopAnimation Jas/faceDirection Jas 0 true/faceDirection Vincent 0/jump Vincent/jump Jas/pause 800/speed Vincent 4/speed Jas 4/move Vincent 0 -3 0 true/move Jas 0 -3 0 true/showFrame Penny 0/faceDirection Penny 2/faceDirection farmer 3/speak Penny "我要為你們介紹一位特殊的嘉賓……我們當地的農夫。 @。#$b#他對農村生活有著切身的體會……他知道谷里所有的“自然資源”！^她對農村生活有著切身的體會……她知道谷里所有的“自然資源”！"/pause 500/speak Penny "有人能告訴我什麼是“自然資源”嗎？"/animate Jas false true 50 20 21/animate Vincent false true 50 16 17/playSound dwop/pause 1200/speak Penny "潔絲？"/stopAnimation Vincent/stopAnimation Jas/speak Jas "自然資源就是在自然狀態下演化形成的物質資源儲藏，有經濟價值。$4"/faceDirection Vincent 1/speak Penny "很好！這個回答可以給兩顆星，潔絲。"/speak Jas "好耶！$h"/faceDirection Vincent 0/speak Penny "那麼，我們有請 @講話。"/move Penny -1 0 1/move farmer -4 0 2/question fork0 "#鄉村生活的全部就是耕種。#鄉村生活的全部就是從大自然獲得饋贈。"/fork choseFarming/pause 500/question fork0 "#這座山谷充滿了珍貴的礦物。#這裡的水域裡生長著許許多多新鮮的海鮮。#你在格蘭普立頓南部找不出比這裡更好的木材。"/fork choseMinerals/animate Vincent false true 50 16 17/playSound dwop/pause 300/faceDirection Penny 2/pause 500/stopAnimation Vincent/speak Penny "文森？"/speak Vincent "@先生，你會娶佩妮老師嗎？$s^@女士……呃，你有男朋友嗎？"/speak Penny "文森！這問題太無禮了！注意你自己的言行，不然我就收回你今天所有的星星。$a"/emote Vincent 28/switchEvent fieldTripEnd
318560/j 10/t 900 1600/d Tue Wed Fri Sat: communityCenter/94 99/farmer 98 88 2 Jas 95 100 3 Vincent 93 100 1/playMusic communityCenter/skippable/move farmer 0 6 2 true/pause 1000/speak Jas "呃……好難聞。$s"/pause 600/jump Vincent/pause 500/faceDirection Vincent 0/pause 500/showFrame Vincent 16/shake Vincent 400/playSound clank/pause 800/shake Vincent 400/playSound clank/pause 800/showFrame Vincent 8/speak Vincent "……$s#$b#怎麼鎖上了？我還想去下水道裡探索一番呢！$s"/pause 800/faceDirection Jas 0/pause 800/speak Jas "鑰匙應該在岡瑟手裡。"/pause 300/faceDirection Vincent 1/speak Vincent "岡瑟教授？開博物館的那個？你為什麼會覺得鑰匙在他手裡？$u"/pause 500/faceDirection Jas 3/speak Jas "有一次，我見到一把生鏽的大鑰匙從他的口袋裡掉了出來。#$b#這種嚇人的下水道柵欄門一定得配一把生鏽的舊鑰匙。$4"/playMusic none/pause 2000/playSound slimeHit/pause 400/playSound slimeHit/pause 400/playSound slimeHit/pause 500/emote Vincent 8 true/emote Jas 8 true/pause 900/faceDirection Vincent 0 true/faceDirection Jas 0 true/pause 1600/playSound shadowpeep/shake Vincent 5000/shake Jas 5000/jump Jas/jump Vincent/faceDirection farmer 3 true/faceDirection Vincent 0 true/faceDirection Jas 0 true/pause 1500/playSound shadowDie/jump Vincent/jump Jas/pause 800/speed Vincent 6/speed Jas 6/advancedMove Jas false 4 0 0 -7 -1 0/advancedMove Vincent false 6 0 0 -8 -1 0/proceedPosition Vincent 98 92/faceDirection farmer 0 true/faceDirection Jas 2 true/faceDirection Vincent 2 true/speak Jas "裡面有東西在動！$u"/shake Jas 4000/shake Vincent 4000/pause 1000/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 1000/move farmer 0 6 3 false/move farmer -4 0 0/pause 800/emote farmer 40/pause 1600/playSound shadowpeep/faceDirection farmer 2 true/jump farmer/showFrame 94/jump Vincent/jump Jas/speed Jas 4/speed Vincent 4/move Jas 0 -6 0 true/move Vincent 0 -6 0 true/pause 1000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end
